materials.raw_text:
Cadmium oxide (CdO) - 30.00 g 
 Nickel oxide (NiO) - 30.00 g 
 Sulfur (S) - 10.00 g 
 Deionized water - 50.00 g (for mixing)

sourcing.instructions:
Cadmium oxide can be purchased from chemical supply companies or online marketplaces specializing in laboratory chemicals. 
 Nickel oxide is available from similar suppliers as above. 
 Sulfur can be sourced from agricultural supply stores or chemical suppliers. 
 Deionized water can be obtained from pharmacy or laboratory supply stores.

preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean, dry glass or ceramic container, measure 30.00 g of cadmium oxide and 30.00 g of nickel oxide. 
 2. Add 10.00 g of sulfur to the container. 
 3. Slowly add 50.00 g of deionized water while stirring continuously to ensure a homogeneous mixture. 
 4. Stir the mixture until a thick paste is formed, ensuring there are no lumps.
